channel.title: Poseidon #317
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img232.imageshack.us/img232/6189/poseidon.png[/img][/center] [center]Welcome to the official development thread for Poseidon [size=24pt][u][b]Information[/b][/u][/size] Poseidon is based of the Hyperion framework. (found here [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381494.0.html]Here[/url]) The server will have no customs such as Dragon claws,god swords,dragon boots ect. the main reason why we picked this base is becuase it is very stable unlike other source's [size=24pt][u][b]Server Features[/b][/u][/size] We don't have many features atm because its a clean source. it has all the main features that Hyperion has. [ul][li]Combat attack types[/li] [li]A few combat animations[/li] [li]Walking and stand animations[/li] [li]Correct attack interfaces[/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li][/ul] [size=24pt][u][b]Update log [/b][/u][/size]
10/10/2010 - Correct attack interface 10/10/210 - Runniny and Standing animations
[size=24pt][u][b]Media[/b][/u][/size] Note the combat forumlas are not done so Constant 3s [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/ri8dpf.jpg[/img] Combat [img]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/6538/ss20101010132744f.png[/img] [img]http://img233.imageshack.us/img233/4313/ss20101010160623.png[/img] [img]http://img233.imageshack.us/img233/6240/ss20101010160643.png[/img] [img]http://img233.imageshack.us/img233/3725/ss20101010160723.png[/img] [size=24pt][u][b]Extra information [/b][/u][/size] The server will be economy the exp rate will be 90 full skills Full npc and player clipping Server creators Ironik/Infinity zr Karl/fire capez There will be a beta for the server we will update the post when there is one Decent website with decent legit forums [/center]

item.title: Poseidon #317
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Zr Infinity Zr
item.description:
@Infinity_Zr wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]Welcome to the official development thread for Poseidon

[size=24pt]Information[/size]
Poseidon is based of the Hyperion framework. (found here Here)
The server will have no customs such as Dragon claws,god swords,dragon boots ect.
the main reason why we picked this base is becuase it is very stable unlike other source’s

[size=24pt]Server Features[/size]
We don’t have many features atm because its a clean source.
it has all the main features that Hyperion has.

[ul][li]Combat attack types[/li]
[li]A few combat animations[/li]
[li]Walking and stand animations[/li]
[li]Correct attack interfaces[/li]
[li][/li]
[li][/li]
[li][/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

[size=24pt]Update log
[/size]

10/10/2010 - Correct attack interface 10/10/210 - Runniny and Standing animations

[size=24pt]Media[/size]
Note the combat forumlas are not done so Constant 3s

ri8dpf.jpg765×501

Combat



[size=24pt]Extra information
[/size]
The server will be economy the exp rate will be 90 full skills
Full npc and player clipping
Server creators
Ironik/Infinity zr
Karl/fire capez
There will be a beta for the server we will update the post when there is one
Decent website with decent legit forums

[/center]

Read full topic
